title: - 1575ft2 - @@@*+*This 3 bed 2 bath, historic home.!!
posting_body: Located on oak tree lined property, next door to Southern Oaks.
This 3 bed 2 bath, historic home features original hardwood floors, newly refinished.
Central A/C and ceilings fans in all rooms.
New appliances and roof.
Abundance of natural light, cabinet space and closets in every bedroom.
Near Lakefront airport, SUNO, UNO, Ben Franklin, South-shore Harbor, and Lake Castle School.
All window coverings provided.
Take long walks along the levee overlooking lake.
Private parking in rear of home.
❦════•⊰❂𝐈𝐟 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝, Please Call me::-
show contact info
Unique property.
Rent Main house only $1000.
Or rent Main house plus studio and 1 car garage $900.
Charming mid century brick home on a corner lot.
3 bed 2 bath main home.
Formal dining room, family room, with fireplace, and large room off the kitchen with built in storage.
Central heat and air conditioning.
Fenced yard Covered parking.
Pets negotiable with additional non refundable 150 fee per pet.
No guard dog breeds per insurance.
Application back ground and credit check required for all occupants over 18.
Non smoking.
Detached studio apartment available for increased rent fee.
$1000 for both house and studio.
Deposit $1000 if renting both.
Shown by appointment only.
